post.description:
Hotel Express Book
==================

Book an Express(SMOC)/CUG(SMOP) rate using the `getExpress.Book` endpoint.

ppn_bundle.description: `ppn_bundle` is a unique ID that ppn uses to identify a specific rate. `ppn_bundles` are provided by `Hotel.Express.Results`.

email.description: Customer's email address to be associated with the booking. We'll use this email address for sending transaction email such as confirmations and cancellations.

add_insurance.description: Insurance for booked product. Valid Options: 0 = No insurance, 1 = Insurance bought.

smoking.description: Smoking room preference for the customer.  Valid Options: 0 = No Preference, 1 = Non-Smoking, and 2 = Smoking.

comments.description: Comment by customer at time of booking.

sale_method.description: Type of device or call center flag. Valid Options: phn = Phone (Call Center), mlb = Mobile, dsk = Desktop.

device_type_id.description: Device type ID for sales tracking. Valid Options: 0 or 3 = Desktop , 1 = Mobile, 2 = Tablet, 4 = Phone.

tracking_id.description: Used by PPN to link the flow of communication/information through our, and our partners', systems. Useful for debugging purposes as it allows us to reference all operations performed by an API request with a single unique ID.

refclickid.description: A custom field commonly used for tracking marketing attribution. Will appear in Google Analytics, and in reports with associated sales.

refclickid2.description: A custom field commonly used for tracking marketing attribution. Will appear in Google Analytics, and in reports with associated sales.

refclickid3.description: A custom field commonly used for tracking marketing attribution. Will appear in Google Analytics, and in reports with associated sales.

review_url.description: URL for a custom hotel itinerary lookup page.

hotel_url.description: URL for a custom hotel page.

allow_duplicate.description: Allow for duplicate bookings. Valid Options: 0 = False, 1 = True

sid.description: A unique value identifying a customer's session, to be passed into multiple endpoints. The same session ID should be passed for the duration of a customer's booking session. This value should be unique for each user session.

newsletter.description: Indicates if customer wants to subscribe to the email newsletter.

newsletter_selected.description: Indicates if customer wants to subscribe to the email newsletter.

client_ip.description: Customer's IP address determined by your integration. Used by PPN for geo-location services and fraud prevention. Make sure you pass the customer's IP rather than your own. Currently only IPv4 addresses are accepted.

card_type.description: Credit card type used for booking. Valid Options: AX (American Express), DS (Discover), MC (Master Card), Euro/Mastercard, VI (VISA)

expires.description: Expiration date of the customer's credit card (MMYYYY).

cvc_code.description: CVC code from the back of the credit card.

country_of_issue.description: Two character country Alpha-2 ISO code.

bank_of_issue.description: Bank associated with the credit card

address_line_one.description: First line of card holder's address.

address_line_two.description: Second line of card holder's address.

address_postal_code.description: Card holder's zip or postal code.

address_state_code.description: Card holder's state or province code.

country_code.description: Two character country Alpha-2 ISO code.

phone_agent.description: If a customer used a phone agent to book. Valid Options: 0 = No, 1 = Yes.

sentence_one.value: In connection with facilitating your hotel transaction, the charge to your method of payment will include a charge for Taxes and Fees. This charge includes an estimated amount to recover the amount we pay to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes owed by the hotel including, without limitation, sales and use tax, occupancy tax, room tax, excise tax, value added tax and/or other similar taxes. In certain locations, the tax amount may also include government imposed service fees or other fees not paid directly to the taxing authorities but required by law to be collected by the hotel. The amount paid to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes may vary from the amount we estimate and include in the charge to you. The balance of the charge for Taxes and Fees is a fee we retain as part of the compensation for our services and to cover the costs of your reservation, including, for example, customer service costs. The charge for Taxes and Fees varies based on a number of factors including, without limitation, the amount we pay the hotel and the location of the hotel where you will be staying, and may include profit that we retain. Except as described below, we are not the vendor collecting and remitting taxes to the applicable taxing authorities. Our hotel suppliers, as vendors, include all applicable taxes in the amount billed to us and we pay over such amounts directly to the vendors. We are not a co-vendor associated with the vendor with whom we book or reserve our customer's travel arrangements. Taxability and the appropriate tax rate and the type of applicable taxes vary greatly by location.

sentence_two.value: For transactions involving hotels located within certain jurisdictions, the charge to your method of payment for Taxes and Fees includes a payment of tax that we are required to collect and remit to the jurisdiction for tax owed on amounts we retain as compensation for our services.

sentence_three.value: Depending on the property you stay at you may also be charged (i) certain mandatory hotel specific service fees, for example, resort fees (which typically apply to resort type destinations and, if applicable, may range from $10 to $40 per day), energy surcharges, newspaper delivery fees, in-room safe fees, tourism fees, or housekeeping fees and/or (ii) certain optional incidental fees, for example, parking charges, minibar charges, phone calls, room service and movie rentals, etc. These charges, if applicable, will be payable by you to the hotel directly at checkout. When you check in, a credit card or, in the hotel's discretion, a debit card, will be required to secure these charges and fees that you may incur during your stay. Please contact the hotel directly as to whether and which charges or service fees apply.

sentence_four.value: Please note that we are unable to facilitate a rebate of Canadian Goods and Services Tax ('GST') for customers booking Canadian hotel accommodations utilizing our services. For bookings in Canada, the charges may also include destination marketing fees collected by the hotel and passed along to tourist bureaus.

This charge includes an estimated amount to recover the amount we pay to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes owed by the hotel including, without limitation, sales and use tax, occupancy tax, room tax, excise tax, value added tax and/or other similar taxes. In certain locations, the tax amount may also include government imposed service fees or other fees not paid directly to the taxing authorities but required by law to be collected by the hotel. The amount paid to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes may vary from the amount we estimate and include in the charge to you. The balance of the charge for Taxes and Fees is a fee we retain as part of the compensation for our services and to cover the costs of your reservation, including, for example, customer service costs. The charge for Taxes and Fees varies based on a number of factors including, without limitation, the amount we pay the hotel and the location of the hotel where you will be staying, and may include profit that we retain. Except as described below, we are not the vendor collecting and remitting taxes to the applicable taxing authorities. Our hotel suppliers, as vendors, include all applicable taxes in the amount billed to us and we pay over such amounts directly to the vendors. We are not a co-vendor associated with the vendor with whom we book or reserve our customer's travel arrangements. Taxability and the appropriate tax rate and the type of applicable taxes vary greatly by location.

For transactions involving hotels located within certain jurisdictions, the charge to your method of payment for Taxes and Fees includes a payment of tax that we are required to collect and remit to the jurisdiction for tax owed on amounts we retain as compensation for our services.

Depending on the property you stay at you may also be charged (i) certain mandatory hotel specific service fees, for example, resort fees (which typically apply to resort type destinations and, if applicable, may range from $10 to $40 per day), energy surcharges, newspaper delivery fees, in-room safe fees, tourism fees, or housekeeping fees and/or (ii) certain optional incidental fees, for example, parking charges, minibar charges, phone calls, room service and movie rentals, etc. These charges, if applicable, will be payable by you to the hotel directly at checkout. When you check in, a credit card or, in the hotel's discretion, a debit card, will be required to secure these charges and fees that you may incur during your stay. Please contact the hotel directly as to whether and which charges or service fees apply.

Please note that we are unable to facilitate a rebate of Canadian Goods and Services Tax ('GST') for customers booking Canadian hotel accommodations utilizing our services. For bookings in Canada, the charges may also include destination marketing fees collected by the hotel and passed along to tourist bureaus.

policy_data.title: Age Restriction Disclosure
paragraph_data: The reservation holder must be 21 years of age or older.

policy_data.title: Guarantee Policy
paragraph_data: Reservation is guaranteed for arrival on the confirmed check-in date only. If you don't check-in to the hotel on the first day of your reservation and you do not alert the hotel in advance the remaining portion of your reservation will be canceled and you will not be entitled to a refund.

policy_data.title: Room Charge Disclosure
paragraph_data: Your credit card is charged the total cost at time of purchase. Prices and room availability are not guaranteed until full payment is received.

policy_data.title: Room Occupancy Disclosure
paragraph_data: All rooms accommodate two guests. Special needs, bed type or other requests are at the discretion of the confirmed hotel. Please contact the hotel directly for availability.

policy_data.title: Check-in Policy
paragraph_data: The reservation holder must present a valid photo ID and credit card at check-in.  The credit card is required for any additional hotel specific service fees or incidental charges or fees that may be charged by the hotel to the customer at checkout. These charges may be mandatory (e.g., resort fees) or optional (parking, phone calls or mini-bar charges) and are not included in the room rate.

policy_data.title: Cancellation Policy
paragraph_data: Each room in this reservation is subject to the hotel's cancellation policy which is: This reservation is non-refundable. There is no refund for no-shows or early checkouts.

policy_data.title: Mandatory Fee Policy
paragraph_data: This hotel charges an additional $18.36 USD, Resort Fee per Night. This fee will be charged to you directly by the hotel. Mandatory fees are not optional and typically cover items such as resort fees, energy charges or safe fees. The amount of the charge is subject to change.

get.description:
Hotel Express Contract
=====================

Provides the inventory and corresponding rates for Express (cache) or Closed User Group (live) using the `getExpress.Contract` endpoint.

parameters.name: ppn_bundle
parameters.description: `ppn_bundle` is a unique ID that ppn uses to identify a specific rate. `ppn_bundles` are provided by `Hotel.Express.Results`.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: A unique value identifying a customer's session, to be passed into multiple endpoints. The same session ID should be passed for the duration of a customer's booking session. This value should be unique for each user session.

parameters.name: rate_identifier
parameters.description: A toggle to show if rate identifier is being passed.  Valid Options: 0 = false, 1 = true.  Rate is a string that is set for each hotel and holds all the information regarding the rate that we send to priceline.

parameters.name: trackingid_value
parameters.description: Used by PPN to link the flow of communication/information through our, and our partners', systems. Useful for debugging purposes as it allows us to reference all operations performed by an API request with a single unique ID.

parameters.name: rate_tracking_id
parameters.description: An ID used by Priceline Contracts to identify the contract's rate.

parameters.name: output_version
parameters.description:
Returns all fields if standard,  These fields if overview:  rate_tracking_id.'  
            'ppn_bundle'
            'id'       
            'id_t'      
            'merchandise' 
            'room_data.  
            Valid Options: 1 = Standard, 2 = Overview

policy_data.title: Guarantee Policy
paragraph_data: Reservation is guaranteed for arrival on the confirmed check-in date only. If you don't check-in to the hotel on the first day of your reservation and you do not alert the hotel in advance the remaining portion of your reservation will be canceled and you will not be entitled to a refund.

policy_data.title: Room Charge Disclosure
paragraph_data: Your credit card is charged the total cost at time of purchase. Prices and room availability are not guaranteed until full payment is received.

policy_data.title: Room Occupancy Disclosure
paragraph_data: All rooms accommodate two guests. Special needs, bed type or other requests are at the discretion of the confirmed hotel. Please contact the hotel directly for availability.

policy_data.title: Check-in Policy
paragraph_data: The reservation holder must present a valid photo ID and credit card at check-in. The credit card is required for any additional hotel specific service fees or incidental charges or fees that may be charged by the hotel to the customer at checkout. These charges may be mandatory (e.g., resort fees) or optional (parking, phone calls or mini-bar charges) and are not included in the room rate.

policy_data.title: Cancellation Policy
paragraph_data: For the room type and rate that you've selected, you are not allowed to change or cancel your reservation. If you cancel your room, you will still be charged for the full reservation amount.

policy_data.title: Travel Insurance (Trip Protection)
paragraph_data: You will receive a letter of Confirmation and Certificate of Insurance/Policy via separate e-mail.#br##br#For more Information, Please visit FAQ's. Or, to manage your policy online, click here. If you prefer, you may also directly contact Allianz Global Assistance's Customer Support Team or call at 1-888-799-3063.#br##br#If you cancel your reservation, please call Allianz Global Assistance at 1-888-799-3063 to request a travel insurance refund or report a claim if cancelling for a covered reason.

policy_data.title: Pets Policy
paragraph_data: Dogs up to 50 pounds welcome with no pet fee required
Your credit card will be charged $88.42 for Hotel Insurance
Within 10 days, depending on your state of residence, you can receive a full refund on your premium if you're not satisfied and you haven't filed a claim or departed for your trip/event.

details_summary.text: For the room type and rate that you've selected, you are not allowed to change or cancel your reservation. If you cancel your room, you will still be charged for the full reservation amount.

important_information: All rooms will accommodate up to 2 people. Requests for bed types (King, Queen, 2 Doubles, etc.) or other request(including preferences for smoking or non-smoking rooms) should be requested through your confirmed hotel and cannot be guaranteed.
taxes_and_fees: In connection with facilitating your hotel transaction, the charge to your method of payment will include a charge for Taxes and Fees. This charge includes an estimated amount to recover the amount we pay to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes owed by the hotel including, without limitation, sales and use tax, occupancy tax, room tax, excise tax, value added tax and/or other similar taxes. In certain locations, the tax amount may also include government imposed service fees or other fees not paid directly to the taxing authorities but required by law to be collected by the hotel. The amount paid to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes may vary from the amount we estimate and include in the charge to you. The balance of the charge for Taxes and Fees is a fee we retain as part of the compensation for our services and to cover the costs of your reservation, including, for example, customer service costs. The charge for Taxes and Fees varies based on a number of factors including, without limitation, the amount we pay the hotel and the location of the hotel where you will be staying, and may include profit that we retain. Except as described below, we are not the vendor collecting and remitting taxes to the applicable taxing authorities. Our hotel suppliers, as vendors, include all applicable taxes in the amount billed to us and we pay over such amounts directly to the vendors. We are not a co-vendor associated with the vendor with whom we book or reserve our customer's travel arrangements. Taxability and the appropriate tax rate and the type of applicable taxes vary greatly by location.

For transactions involving hotels located within certain jurisdictions, the charge to your method of payment for Taxes and Fees includes a payment of tax that we are required to collect and remit to the jurisdiction for tax owed on amounts we retain as compensation for our services.

Depending on the property you stay at you may also be charged (i) certain mandatory hotel specific service fees, for example, resort fees (which typically apply to resort type destinations and, if applicable, may range from $10 to $40 per day), energy surcharges, newspaper delivery fees, in-room safe fees, tourism fees, or housekeeping fees and/or (ii) certain optional incidental fees, for example, parking charges, minibar charges, phone calls, room service and movie rentals, etc. These charges, if applicable, will be payable by you to the hotel directly at checkout. When you check in, a credit card or, in the hotel's discretion, a debit card, will be required to secure these charges and fees that you may incur during your stay. Please contact the hotel directly as to whether and which charges or service fees apply.

Please note that we are unable to facilitate a rebate of Canadian Goods and Services Tax ('GST') for customers booking Canadian hotel accommodations utilizing our services. For bookings in Canada, the charges may also include destination marketing fees collected by the hotel and passed along to tourist bureaus.

Hotel Express Lookup
====================

Displays the reservation details using the `getExpress.LookUp` endpoint.

tracking_id.description: Used by PPN to link the flow of communication/information through our, and our partners', systems. Useful for debugging purposes as it allows us to reference all operations performed by an API request with a single unique ID.

currency.description: Requested currency for the results. ISO 4217 format.

sid.description: A unique value identifying a customer's session, to be passed into multiple endpoints. The same session ID should be passed for the duration of a customer's booking session. This value should be unique for each user session.

itinerary_details.description: Double Occupancy Room, Assigned By Hotel At Check In.

policy_data.text: For the room type and rate that you've selected, you are not allowed to change or cancel your reservation. If you cancel your room, you will still be charged for the full reservation amount.

paragraph_data: Reservations cannot be refunded or changed. Full payment is required upon booking.
Your reservation will be confirmed in a 2 star or higher hotel in your selected area and may not be one that you saw during a previous search. Only Amenities listed above are guaranteed.

The reservation holder must be 21 years of age or older and must present a valid photo ID and credit card at check-in.  The hotel may charge you for mandatory (e.g. resort) fees or incidentals (e.g. parking). These charges are not included in your reservation price.
All rooms accommodate two guests. Special needs, bed type or other requests are at the discretion of the confirmed hotel. Please contact the hotel directly for availability.

In connection with facilitating your hotel transaction, the charge to your method of payment will include a charge for Taxes and Fees. This charge includes an estimated amount to recover the amount we pay to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes owed by the hotel including, without limitation, sales and use tax, occupancy tax, room tax, excise tax, value added tax and/or other similar taxes. In certain locations, the tax amount may also include government imposed service fees or other fees not paid directly to the taxing authorities but required by law to be collected by the hotel. The amount paid to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes may vary from the amount we estimate and include in the charge to you. The balance of the charge for Taxes and Fees is a fee we retain as part of the compensation for our services and to cover the costs of your reservation, including, for example, customer service costs. The charge for Taxes and Fees varies based on a number of factors including, without limitation, the amount we pay the hotel and the location of the hotel where you will be staying, and may include profit that we retain.
Except as described below, we are not the vendor collecting and remitting taxes to the applicable taxing authorities. Our hotel suppliers, as vendors, include all applicable taxes in the amount billed to us and we pay over such amounts directly to the vendors. We are not a co-vendor associated with the vendor with whom we book or reserve our customer's travel arrangements. Taxability and the appropriate tax rate and the type of applicable taxes vary greatly by location.

For transactions involving hotels located within certain jurisdictions, the charge to your method of payment for Taxes and Fees includes a payment of tax that we are required to collect and remit to the jurisdiction for tax owed on amounts we retain as compensation for our services.

Depending on the property you stay at you may also be charged (i) certain mandatory hotel specific service fees, for example, resort fees (which typically apply to resort type destinations and, if applicable, may range from $10 to $40 per day), energy surcharges, newspaper delivery fees, in-room safe fees, tourism fees, or housekeeping fees and/or (ii) certain optional incidental fees, for example, parking charges, minibar charges, phone calls, room service and movie rentals, etc. These charges, if applicable, will be payable by you to the hotel directly at checkout. When you check in, a credit card or, in the hotel's discretion, a debit card, will be required to secure these charges and fees that you may incur during your stay. Please contact the hotel directly as to whether and which charges or service fees apply.

Please note that we are unable to facilitate a rebate of Canadian Goods and Services Tax ("GST") for customers booking Canadian hotel accommodations utilizing our services. For bookings in Canada, the charges may also include destination marketing fees collected by the hotel and passed along to tourist bureaus.

Depending on the property you stay at you may also be charged (i) certain mandatory hotel specific service fees, for example, resort fees (which typically apply to resort type destinations and, if applicable, may range from $10 to $40 per day), energy surcharges, newspaper delivery fees, in-room safe fees, tourism fees, or housekeeping fees and/or (ii) certain optional incidental fees, for example, parking charges, minibar charges, phone calls, room service and movie rentals, etc. These charges, if applicable, will be payable by you to the hotel directly at checkout. When you check in, a credit card or, in the hotel's discretion, a debit card, will be required to secure these charges and fees that you may incur during your stay. Please contact the hotel directly as to whether and which charges or service fees apply.

Please note that we are unable to facilitate a rebate of Canadian Goods and Services Tax ("GST") for customers booking Canadian hotel accommodations utilizing our services. For bookings in Canada, the charges may also include destination marketing fees collected by the hotel and passed along to tourist bureaus.

get.description:
Hotel Express Results
=====================

Provides discounted Express (Cached) and Closed User Group (Live) Rates using the `getExpress.Results` endpoint.

parameters.name: check_in
parameters.description: Check In Date (YYYY-MM-DD or MM/DD/YYYY)

parameters.name: check_out
parameters.description: Check Out Date (YYYY-MM-DD or MM/DD/YYYY)

parameters.name: rooms
parameters.description: Number of rooms required for all occupants

parameters.name: adults
parameters.description: The total number of adult occupants for all rooms requested. Used with `children` parameter to determine occupancy. Example: Two rooms, each with one adult and one child occupants, `adults=2` and `children=2`

parameters.name: children
parameters.description: The total number of child occupants for all rooms requested. Used with `adults` parameter to determine occupancy. Example: Two rooms, each with one adult and one child occupants, `adults=2` and `children=2`

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Requested currency for the results. ISO 4217 format.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Sort results by guest score Valid Options: gs = guest_score, star rating = sr, low price = lp, high price = hp, distance = ds.

parameters.name: multiple_deals
parameters.description: Multi Rates are provided Valid Options: 0 = false, 1 = true.

parameters.name: output_version
parameters.description:
Returns all fields if standard,  These fields if overview:  rate_tracking_id.'  
            'ppn_bundle'
            'id'       
            'id_t'      
            'merchandise' 
            'room_data.  
            Valid Options: 1 = Standard, 2 = Overview

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: A unique value identifying a customer's session, to be passed into multiple endpoints. The same session ID should be passed for the duration of a customer's booking session. This value should be unique for each user session.

parameters.name: merchandise
parameters.description: Deprecated

parameters.name: rate_identifier
parameters.description: A toggle to show if rate identifier is being passed.  Valid Options: 0 = false, 1 = true.  Rate is a string that is set for each hotel and holds all the information regarding the rate that we send to priceline.

parameters.name: field_blacklist
parameters.description: Comma separated list of elements to remove from API response. Useful to limit data transmission of unused data, for example removing amenity information (`field_blacklist=amenity_data`) can significantly reduce the size of the response.

parameters.name: featured_hotel_ids
parameters.description: PPN Hotel ID(s) to add to featured hotels in the results list

parameters.name: limit_to_country
parameters.description: Limits results to country provided. Valid Options: true or false.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit number of hotel ids sent to upstream. If omitted, original city id based search and non-limited results are expected.

parameters.name: rate_limit
parameters.description: Number passed to limit the number of rates returned. Defaults to returning all available rates

parameters.name: city_id
parameters.description: Accepts a single PPN City ID.

parameters.name: airport_code
parameters.description: Accepts a 3-character IATA airport code.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Search for property availability around a specific `latitude` coordinate

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Search for property availability around a specific `longitude` coordinate

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius in miles the results are from

parameters.name: hotel_ids
parameters.description: Comma separated string of PPN hotel ids (Semi Opaque Only)

x-code-samples.label: PHP
x-code-samples.source:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
    CURLOPT_URL => "{{ server }}/hotel/getExpress.Results?format=json2&refid={{ refid }}&api_key={{ api_key }}&city_id=800049480&check_in=2018-12-10&check_out=2018-12-12&rooms=1&adults=2&children=0",
    CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
    CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
    CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
    CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
    CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
    CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
    CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
        "Cache-Control: no-cache"
    ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
    echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
    echo $response;
}
